foreignData.text: Die Pfeile der Justiz fügen einer angreifenden oder blockenden Kreatur deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Les archers de l'Académie militaire d'Horizon peaufinent leur art en ciblant les pickpockets à plusieurs pâtés de maisons de distance.
foreignData.name: Flèches de la justice
foreignData.text: Les Flèches de la justice infligent 4 blessures à la créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: Gli arcieri dell'Accademia Militare dell'Orizzonte si allenano mirando ai borseggiatori da isolati di distanza.

foreignData.flavorText: 地平線軍事アカデミーの弓兵は、数街区隔てた場所にいるスリを標的にして腕を磨く。
foreignData.name: 正義の矢
foreignData.text: 攻撃かブロックしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。正義の矢はそれに４点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 지평선 사관학교 궁수들은 학교에서 간신히 보일만한 곳에 있는 거리의 소매치기들을 과녁으로 삼아 궁술을 연마한다.
foreignData.name: 정의의 화살
foreignData.text: 공격생물이나 방어생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 정의의 화살은 그 생물에게 피해 4점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os arqueiros da Academia Militar Horizonte aperfeiçoam suas habilidades usando batedores de carteira a quarteirões de distância como alvo.
foreignData.name: Flechas da Justiça
foreignData.text: Flechas da Justiça causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura atacante ou bloqueadora alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Лучники военной академии Горизонта оттачивают свое мастерство, стреляя по карманникам на расстоянии нескольких кварталов.
foreignData.name: Стрелы Правосудия
foreignData.text: Стрелы Правосудия наносят 4 повреждения целевому атакующему или блокирующему существу.

foreignData.flavorText: 天际军校的弓箭手拿远处的扒手来磨练技巧。

foreignData.flavorText: 天際軍校的弓箭手拿遠處的扒手來磨練技巧。
foreignData.name: 正義之箭

name: Arrows of Justice
originalText: Arrows of Justice deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” or “blocking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker or blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking or blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking or blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat, or the creature or creatures it was blocking have left combat, as appropriate.
Arrows of Justice may be cast during the end of combat step, after combat damage has been dealt.

text: Arrows of Justice deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
